Module

x_StateAndConfig

Displays a comparison table of the xConfig and the current state.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
stateX Object

The current state to compare with the xConfig.

View Source src/modules/NetGetX/config/x_StateAndConfig.js, line 3

  • A promise that resolves when the comparison is complete.
Promise.<void>
